summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LeadBridge marketplace application including backend APIs, frontend UI, authentication flows, role-based dashboards, and event booking system. Backend achieved 92.3% success rate with minor authentication issues. Frontend authentication and navigation working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Admin login returns USER role instead of ADMIN role
flaky_endpoints.impact: Admin authentication may not work correctly in some scenarios

minor_issues.issue: Create event returns status 200 instead of expected 201
minor_issues.impact: Event creation works but returns incorrect status code

integration_issues.issue: Console shows 401 errors when accessing event details without login

passed_tests: Landing page loads with events display
User dashboard loads and displays bookings
Mentor dashboard loads with profile/events/leads tabs
Admin dashboard loads with analytics and management tools
Event listing and detail page navigation
Role-based access control (users blocked from admin/mentor endpoints)
Backend API endpoints (events, profiles, bookings, admin functions)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin authentication issue where admin login returns USER role instead of ADMIN role. This may be related to session management or role assignment in the authentication flow.
